name: Loge's Flame
desc: While you control a "Valkyrie" monster, monsters your opponent controls with 2000 or less ATK cannot attack. If this card in your possession is destroyed by an opponent's card effect: You can Special Summon 1 Level 5 or higher "Valkyrie" monster from your hand or Deck.

card_sets.set_name: 2020 Tin of Lost Memories Mega Pack
